segments.text: So do you believe in palmistry ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's when someone takes a look at another person's palm 4 to tell the future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you mean palm reading 5 . I've seen that before , but I don't believe in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure ? I've read a lot about palmistry and I've been able to tell a lot of accurate things about a person from his palm . Do you want me to take a look at your hand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? You've read books about it ? Ok , then . But only if you want to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , let's see , well , you've got a long life line , which is good , and the love line is strong ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What else do you see ? Will I be successful ? Will I make a lot of money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm , hard to say , wait , yes , it looks like you will do well in business , and your ambition will help you a lot , but ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? What is it ? What's the matter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You seem to have a large gullibility line . You believe everything that you're told .
segments.speaker: S1
